@page "/breadcrumb/default-functionalities"

@using Syncfusion.Blazor.Buttons
@using Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations

@*Hidden:Lines*@
@inherits SampleBaseComponent
@inject NavigationManager NavigationManager


@*End:Hidden*@

<SampleDescription>
    <p>This sample demonstrates the basic rendering of the <a href="https://www.syncfusion.com/blazor-components/blazor-breadcrumb" aria-label="Blazor Breadcrumb">Blazor Breadcrumb</a> component with icon support. 
        Click the <b>Reset State</b> button to refresh Breadcrumb component to its initial state.</p>
</SampleDescription>
<ActionDescription>
    <p>The <a href="https://www.syncfusion.com/blazor-components/blazor-breadcrumb">Blazor Breadcrumb</a> component is used as a navigational aid to identify the current page location within the navigational hierarchy structure of websites. 
        It has list of items that can be populated using the <a href="https://help.syncfusion.com/cr/blazor/Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.BreadcrumbItems.html" aria-label="BreadcrumbItems">BreadcrumbItems</a>.</p>
    <p><b>Simple Breadcrumb</b></p>
    <p>The Breadcrumb is populated with text, icon, and URL.</p>
    <p><b>Breadcrumb with Overflow</b></p>
    <p>In this Breadcrumb component, <a href="https://help.syncfusion.com/cr/blazor/Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.SfBreadcrumb.html#Syncfusion_Blazor_Navigations_SfBreadcrumb_MaxItems" aria-label="MaxItems">MaxItems</a> and <a href="https://help.syncfusion.com/cr/blazor/Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.SfBreadcrumb.html#Syncfusion_Blazor_Navigations_SfBreadcrumb_OverflowMode">OverflowMode</a> properties were used to limit the number of breadcrumb items to be displayed.
        The <code>MaxItems</code> is set to 3 and <code>OverflowMode</code> is set to <code>Menu</code>.
        Also, to prevent breadcrumb item navigation, the <a href="https://help.syncfusion.com/cr/blazor/Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.SfBreadcrumb.html#Syncfusion_Blazor_Navigations_SfBreadcrumb_EnableNavigation" aria-label="EnableNavigation">EnableNavigation</a> property is set to <code>false</code>.</p>
    <p><b>Active Last Breadcrumb</b></p>
    <p>In this Breadcrumb component, navigation for the last item is enabled by using <a href="https://help.syncfusion.com/cr/blazor/Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.SfBreadcrumb.html#Syncfusion_Blazor_Navigations_SfBreadcrumb_EnableActiveItemNavigation" aria-label="EnableActiveItemNavigation">EnableActiveItemNavigation</a> property.</p>
    <p><b>See also</b></p>
    <ul>
       <li><a href='https://blazor.syncfusion.com/documentation/breadcrumb/getting-started/' target='_blank' aria-label="Getting started with Blazor Breadcrumb">Getting started with Blazor Breadcrumb</a></li>
    </ul>
</ActionDescription>

<div class="col-lg-12 control-section">
    <div class="content-wrapper">
        <div class="row material2">
            <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-12 col-md-12">
                <h5 style="display: inline-block">Simple Breadcrumb</h5>
                <SfButton class="e-small reset-btn" @onclick="ResetBtnClickHandler">Reset State</SfButton>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row material2">
            <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-12 col-md-12">
                <SfBreadcrumb EnableNavigation="false" ActiveItem="@SimpleActiveItem">
                    <BreadcrumbItems>
                        <BreadcrumbItem IconCss="e-icons e-home" Url="https://blazor.syncfusion.com/demos/"/>
                        <BreadcrumbItem Text="Components" Url="https://blazor.syncfusion.com/demos/datagrid/overview"/>
                        <BreadcrumbItem Text="Navigations" Url="https://blazor.syncfusion.com/demos/menu-bar/default-functionalities"/>
                        <BreadcrumbItem Text="Breadcrumb" Url="./breadcrumb/default-functionalities"/>
                    </BreadcrumbItems>
                </SfBreadcrumb>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row material2">
            <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-12 col-md-12">
                <h5>Breadcrumb with Overflow</h5>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row material2">
            <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-12 col-md-12">
                <SfBreadcrumb MaxItems="3" EnableNavigation="false" ActiveItem="@OverflowActiveItem">
                    <BreadcrumbItems>
                        <BreadcrumbItem Text="Home" Url="./"/>
                        <BreadcrumbItem Text="Breadcrumb" Url="./breadcrumb"/>
                        <BreadcrumbItem Text="Default" Url="./breadcrumb/default-functionalities"/>
                        <BreadcrumbItem Text="Icons" Url="./breadcrumb/icons"/>
                        <BreadcrumbItem Text="Navigation" Url="./breadcrumb/navigation"/>
                        <BreadcrumbItem Text="Overflow" Url="./breadcrumb/overflow"/>
                    </BreadcrumbItems>
                    <BreadcrumbTemplates>
                        <SeparatorTemplate>
                            <span class="e-bicons e-arrow"></span>
                        </SeparatorTemplate>
                    </BreadcrumbTemplates>
                </SfBreadcrumb>
            </div>
        </div>
         <div class="row material2">
            <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-12 col-md-12">
                <h5>Active Last Breadcrumb</h5>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row material2">
            <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-12 col-md-12">
                <SfBreadcrumb EnableNavigation="false" EnableActiveItemNavigation="true" ActiveItem="@LastActiveItem">
                    <BreadcrumbItems>
                        <BreadcrumbItem IconCss="e-icons e-home" Url="https://blazor.syncfusion.com/demos/"/>
                        <BreadcrumbItem Text="All Components" Url="https://blazor.syncfusion.com/demos/datagrid/overview"/>
                        <BreadcrumbItem Text="Breadcrumb" Url="./breadcrumb/default-functionalities"/>
                    </BreadcrumbItems>
                </SfBreadcrumb>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

@code {
    private string SimpleActiveItem = "./breadcrumb/default-functionalities";
    private string LastActiveItem = "./breadcrumb/default-functionalities";
    private string OverflowActiveItem = "./breadcrumb/overflow";
    

    // To refresh all Breadcrumb control state when reset button clicked
    private void ResetBtnClickHandler() 
    {
        SimpleActiveItem = "./breadcrumb/default-functionalities";
        OverflowActiveItem = "./breadcrumb/overflow";
        LastActiveItem = "./breadcrumb/default-functionalities";
    }
}

@*Hidden:Lines*@
<style>
    .content-wrapper {
        width: 90%;
        margin: 0 auto;
        min-width: 85px;
    }
    
    .content-wrapper div.row {
        padding: 15px 0px;
    }

    @@media only screen and (max-width: 480px) {
        .content-wrapper {
            width: 92%;
        }

        .col-xs-12,
        .col-xs-4,
        .col-xs-12 {
            padding: 10px 5px;
            width: 100%;
        }

        .content-wrapper div.row {
            padding: 0px;
        }
    }

    .tailwind .e-breadcrumb,
    .tailwind-dark .e-breadcrumb {
        margin-left: -12px;
    }

    .material .e-breadcrumb,
    .material-dark .e-breadcrumb {
        margin-left: -8px;
    }

    .fabric .e-breadcrumb,
    .fabric-dark .e-breadcrumb,
    .highcontrast .e-breadcrumb {
        margin-left: -4px;
    }

    .reset-btn {
        float: right;
        margin: 5px 2px 5px 0;
    }
</style>
@*End:Hidden*@

<style>
 @@font-face {
    font-family: 'e-bicons';
    src:
    url(data:application/x-font-ttf;charset=utf-8;base64,) format('truetype');
    font-weight: normal;
    font-style: normal;
    }

    .e-bicons {
        font-family: 'e-bicons' !important;
        font-size: 14px;
    }

    .e-breadcrumb .e-breadcrumb-separator + .e-breadcrumb-separator {
        padding-left: 0;
        margin-left: -8px;
    }
   
    .e-bicons.e-arrow {
        margin-top: -2px;
    }

    .bootstrap .e-bicons.e-arrow,
    .bootstrap4 .e-bicons.e-arrow,
    .bootstrap-dark .e-bicons.e-arrow {
        margin-top: -3px;
    }

    .tailwind .e-bicons.e-arrow,
    .tailwind-dark .e-bicons.e-arrow {
        margin-top: -4px;
    }

    .e-arrow:before {
        content: "\e706";
        font-weight: 800;
        font-size: 9px;
    }
</style>
